solution_line_template: Harold shared {total_marbles} - {marbles_kept} = <<{total_marbles}-{marbles_kept}={marbles_shared}>>{marbles_shared} marbles with his friends.
Therefore, his {num_friends} friends got {marbles_shared}/{num_friends} = <<{marbles_shared}/{num_friends}={marbles_per_friend}>>{marbles_per_friend} marbles each.
